features: The pack contains 5 folders, each presented in an elegantly curated vibrant hue, infusing a blend of sophistication and charm into your document storage.
Crafted from high-quality plastic, Mr. Pen file folders offer superior resistance to wear, tear, and moisture, ensuring your documents remain pristine and protected.
Designed with two spacious pockets and a trio of center prongs, these folders facilitate both loose and bound document storage, ensuring effortless organization and accessibility of papers.
With dimensions of 11.5" x 9.35", the folders are tailored to snugly accommodate standard-sized papers, guaranteeing a neat, tidy, and crease-free storage solution.

Ideal for a broad spectrum of users, from students organizing project materials to professionals presenting proposals, these folders cater to a wide range of paper management and presentation requirements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These folders were just perfect for my project, good quality, perfect size and cute colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These plastic folders are nice. The quality and price are decent compared to other brands of folders. The metal prongs do not seem cheap and seem that they will hold up to usage. The folder part is not very secure but that is not important to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These serve the intended purpose well
reviews.reviewText: Here is an example of a product that you know up front exactly what it is going to be. Obviously, it is bound to be a 5-star item or I would not have ordered it. In other words, there is no reason to give it less than 5-stars. I got these based on price. Granted, I ordered these initial ones through Vine, however after no unpleasant surprises when I need more, I won't hesitate to place another order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another nice selection of plastic folders / report covers
reviews.reviewText: I've always liked using thin report covers for storing smaller printouts, as they take up much less room on my desk than a typical 3-ring binder. These Mr. Pen plastic folders are a good addition to my collection.I appreciate the varied colors included (peach, pink, yellow, and 2 shades of green to my eye), as it makes it easier to grab the right folder if I'm in a hurry. The construction is solid, and I expect these will last just as long as the reinforced paper folders I typically use. And I'm not sure I'll need the built-in pockets, but it is a handy feature to have. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these to replace some very used and tattered paper folders. These are just what they say they are -- two pocket folders with three prongs in the center for hole punched paper. The plastic is nice and sturdy and they hold a good amount of paper. I prefer plastic because I can wipe down the outside which is important because I used one for old family recipes that are in plastic sleeves. I can also tuck things in the pockets. I like the colors because they are different and not the standard colors. The muted colors are fun and I will definitely know which folder to grab just based on the color. Perfect folders for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to hold 30+ pages with each of these folders and they all stay in place well
reviews.reviewText: These file folders work pretty well. They come in 5 different colors and all have two pockets and three prongs, which add a lot of value to this product. It's easy to hold 30+ pages with each of these folders and they all stay in place well. Great product and I'd recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive, durable, holds a lot
reviews.reviewText: These report covers are a great replacement for the paper covers I've used in the past, which were ugly and flimsy. I am using them for plant ID information that I've printed out for ongoing reference, like the guide to native ferns that's shown in the photo. It appears that each of the report covers will hold 40-50 pages. The set comes with 5 different colors, so it's easy to grab the specific print-out you need. And there are pockets in the front and back covers for loose sheets. I also really love the color assortment. For me, this product is a win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these sturdy, plastic folders. It has three metal prongs inside to hold filler paper or sheet protectors. It also has two inner pockets to conveniently hold excess papers. They are colors are very pleasing! I personally use plastic folders for my students homework folder. They will last all school year.
